hero.title: Logistics solutions for Publishing
hero.description: We distribute your books, magazines and printed materials to every point of sale with precision and traceability.

intro.text: At Yobel SCM we offer specialized logistics solutions for the publishing industry. We manage warehousing, distribution and value-added services for books, magazines, newspapers and promotional materials.

items.title: Publishing Warehousing
items.description: Humidity and light controlled facilities for optimal preservation of printed material, with WMS and rotation control.

items.title: Specialized Distribution
items.description: National and local coverage to bookstores, chains, libraries and direct points of sale with 99.6% OTIF compliance.

items.title: Value-Added Services (VAS)
items.description: Labeling, shrink wrapping, kit assembly, promotions and customization by client or channel.

items.title: Returns Management
items.description: Efficient reverse logistics with quality control, destruction or redistribution as needed.

items.title: Foreign Trade
items.description: Coordination of imports and exports of books and publications with customs compliance and document control.

benefits.title: Precision, availability and material care
items: Total traceability by title, batch or campaign.
Flexibility for launches, seasons or special editions.

items.title: Bookstore replenishment
items.fullDesc: Continuous supply to chains and independent stores.

items.title: Periodic distribution
items.fullDesc: Scheduled delivery of magazines, newspapers or series.

items.title: E-commerce fulfillment
items.fullDesc: Preparation and dispatch direct to reader.

items.title: Promotions and special editions
items.fullDesc: Kitting and distribution of bundled products.

certificates.description: We operate with international certifications that guarantee quality and care in every stage of the publishing chain.
